name: Swurve Media Corporation
tag_list: online-dating, online-personals, hookup, hook-up, hookup-site, casual-personals, casual-dating, friends-with-benefits, sex-positive, community-site, community-sites
overview:
Swurve Media Corporation is an online media company based out of Clearwater, Florida that specializes in premium online community sites. The company’s flagship property, Swurve.com, was launched in February 2010 and provides users a unique connection building platform through which members can embrace their sexuality and explore their desires in a judgment free environment.

Swurve.com is intended solely for adults but takes a softer, more personal approach with its user interface, thus standing apart from adult dating competitors and steering away from more explicit content to keep the brand marketable through mainstream channels.

The casual personals community caters to men and women seeking to hook up or find friends with benefits across the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom and Australia.
